ISSUE.TITLE: two alternate spellings start with a space
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The following alternate spellings (altSpelling) start with a space: " República del Perú" > Peru (PER) " the Abode of Peace" > Brunei Darussalam (BRN)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: PR #258 Remove Zimbabwe empty currency Applying #155

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Removed spaces from alternate spellings Fixes https://github.com/apilayer/restcountries/issues/125
